name: Urdu HTML Master V1.0
short_description:
Urdu HTML Master Version 1.0 is a free and first ever software of its type which allow to create webpages is Urdu, Persian and Arabic languages using unicode in a WYSIWYG user-friendly environment. Efficient web page and html editor.

Source Code at : https://github.com/dasatti/urduhtmlmaster

All of you are welcome to colleborate on the project.
